long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The worlds simplest Phone System to CRM integration software tool. Carolina Digital Phone's API integration platform providing database driven screen pops.

The Carolina Digital Phone app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Salesforce, Zendesk, ZOHO, vtiger, FreshDesk, Google, Infusionsoft, Google Contect, and many more)

By leveraging APIs the Carolina Digital Phone extension will search any internal database a present the findings in a new window. Carolina Digital Phone's app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial. 

You must be a subscribed Carolina Digital Phone customer to use this extension. Please call 336-346-6000 for more information.
